title: Bug 14197: Changes Applied Immediately After Removing Working Set
description: When a working set containing one project is created and selected, the package view is filtered accordingly. However, upon removing the working set, changes are applied instantly.
OB: Upon creating a working set with one project and selecting it, the package view is filtered as expected.
EB: After removing the working set, the package view should remain unaffected until a new working set is selected or the filtering behavior should revert to the default state.
SR:
1. Create a working set with one project and select it.
2. Observe the package view being filtered accordingly.
3. Remove the working set and observe the immediate application of changes in the package view.
